segments.text: Can you tell me what the date and time of our field trip is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are leaving on our science field trip at 8 a . m . next Monday . Do you have something to write that down on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I can write that on my calendar .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That will be on the second of December . Be there half an hour early to get your bags on the bus . Do you understand ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The bus will bring you back 6 days later on December 8th . Is someone coming to get you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I don't have a ride yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We will be leaving the campground at 5 in the evening and arrive at our campus at 8 p.m.Any more questions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much will the trip cost ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I put all of that information in the packet . I'll give you another copy if you need one . See you on Monday !
segments.speaker: S2
